articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae and His Party Tour Various Parts of Moscow
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae and His Party Tour Various Parts of Moscow
 Moscow, November 19 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is visiting the Russian Federation as a special envoy of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, and his party visited the Central Museum of Great Patriotic War in Moscow on Tuesday. 
					 They went round several places of the museum including semi-panoramas showing main battles during the war, being briefed on the heroic feats the Red Army and the Russian people performed by playing a decisive role in beating back fascist Germany's aggression and crushing fascism. 
					
					 The special envoy made an entry in the visitor's book. 
					
					 The special envoy and his party visited the Lenin Mausoleum, the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier, the Kremlin, etc. on Wednesday.

articles.title: Vice-Chief of KPA General Staff Meets His Russian Counterpart
articles.content:
Vice-Chief of KPA General Staff Meets His Russian Counterpart
 Moscow, November 19 (KCNA Correspondent) -- No Kwang Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Wednesday met Andrei Kartapolov, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of its General Operation Bureau  of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. No Kwang Chol is staying in Moscow as a member of the party of the special envoy of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 Both sides had a wide-ranging exchange of views on putting the friendship and cooperation between the armies of the two countries on a new higher stage. 
					
					 Present there were the defence attache of the DPRK embassy in Moscow and the vice director of the General Operation Bureau of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. 
					
					 Meanwhile, on the same day Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations who is a member of the special envoy's party, met Alexandr Galushka, minister of Development of Far East of Russia, and discussed measures for further boosting cooperation between the two countries in economy and trade for more substantial results.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Rejects UN "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Rejects UN "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Thursday issued the following statement in denunciation of the UN "resolution on human rights" against the DPRK:
					 The United States perpetrated such grave politically-motivated provocation as railroading the "resolution on human rights" against the DPRK through the meeting of the Third Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly on Nov. 18 by instigating the EU and Japan and setting in motion hand-raising machines through highhanded practice and political and economic pressure.
					
					 The "resolution" is peppered with malignant accusations based on such conspiratorial document as the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on human rights situation in the DPRK, a collection of lies and fabrications called "testimonies" made by a handful of "defectors from the north" who fled or were  lured after committing crimes in the DPRK.
					
					 The history of the UN does not know such precedence as adopting a "resolution" of its General Assembly based on a "report" hastily worked out without any dialogue with the country concerned and any visit to it.
					
					 The U.S. barely managed to garner votes necessary for adopting the "resolution" by whipping together hand-raising machines but not a few countries confessed that they voted for it under the threat of the U.S. and Japan to halt economic aid, not because of human rights issue. This clearly proves that the "resolution" was a political fraud.
					
					  Some countries of the EU and Japan acted servants for adopting the "resolution," disclosing themselves that their much touted "efforts for human rights" were not for a genuine improvement of human rights but for the pursuance of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and sycophancy towards it. 
					
					 This time the DPRK clarified its will to have wide-ranging cooperation in the field of human rights and readiness to actively promote human rights dialogue and exchange. However, the hostile forces finally denied cooperation and chose the way of confrontation. 
					
					 This behavior revealed that the call of the followers of the U.S. for human rights dialogue was hypocritical and closed themselves the door of not only human rights dialogue but other dialogues and exchange and cooperation. 
					
					 The U.S. kicked off its "human rights" offensive against the DPRK in real earnest in a bid to invent a pretext for armed intervention by terming the DPRK a "tundra of human rights abuses" in the international arena. 
					
					  History vividly remembers the Yugoslav War unleashed by the U.S. in 1999 under the pretext of "protecting human rights and a minority".
					
					 A dangerous precedent is in the making to politicize and internationalize the human rights issue of an individual country and use it for toppling its social system. 
					
					 The prevailing serious situation in which international law is violated by high-handed practices goes to more clearly prove the DPRK's constant view that human rights precisely mean national sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK bitterly denounces and categorically rejects the railroading of the recent "resolution" manipulated by the U.S. in an attempt to topple the socialist system centered on the popular masses, the system chosen by the Korean people and which they regard as dearer than their own lives, as the most striking manifestation of the hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Now that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK compels the latter not to exercise restraint any longer  in conducting a new nuclear test, its war deterrence will grow stronger unlimitedly to cope with the armed intervention of the U.S.
					
					 The principal architect of the above-said "resolution" and its servants will be held wholly responsible for all the consequences to be entailed by its adoption.

articles.title: Officials Compete in Table-Tennis Matches
articles.content:
Officials Compete in Table-Tennis Matches
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Table-tennis matches of officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium from Nov. 17 to 20.
					 Almost 1,000 men and women players from at least 100 units, divided in four groups, competed on a knockout basis. They fully displayed their table-tennis technique.
					
					 The Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, the General Bureau of Public Service, the Taesong Guidance Bureau and the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House came first in each group.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Berth to 2015 East Asia Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Berth to 2015 East Asia Cup
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team was qualified to participate in the 2015 EAFF East Asia Cup.
					 League matches of the second-phase preliminaries took place in Taipei of China from Nov. 13 to 19. They brought together teams from the DPRK, Hong Kong of China, Guam and Taipei of China. 
					
					 The DPRK team defeated its Hong Kong of China rival 2:1 on Nov. 13, its Guam rival 5:1 on Nov. 16 and tied with its rival of Taipei of China 0:0 on Nov. 19. 
					
					 It came first in the preliminaries, securing a berth to the East Asia Cup to be held in August, 2015.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Secure Water Resources for Farming
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Secure Water Resources for Farming
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Co-op farms in the DPRK have turned out in a campaign to secure water resources for next year's farming.
					 This year witnessed the severest drought in 100 years, which made the water level of reservoirs across the country stand at the lowest now.
					
					 Under this situation, a work is going on in the countryside to build various-sized reservoirs to store running water.
					
					 The co-op farms also concentrate efforts on securing water resources by giving full play to the groundwater tapping facilities.
					
					 Meanwhile, big efforts are paid to repairing floodgates, embankments and waterways so as to save water as much as possible.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Special Care to Children
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Special Care to Children
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has always paid deep attention to the growth and development of children.
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the government bestow all benefits on the children so that they can enjoy their rights to the full in education, health service and all other fields.
					
					 The DPRK government enforced the universal 12-year compulsory education while consolidating the free medical care system.
					
					 Orphans are leading a happy life at baby homes and orphanages run at the state expense, and those children in remote mountain villages and isolated areas like islets and disabled children, too, can cultivate their talents to the full.
					
					 In the country, everything is provided on a priority basis for the children's health, education and life.
					
					 Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, Okryu Children's Hospital, Songdowon International Children's Camp and other recently-built or renovated edifices go to clearly prove the reality of the DPRK which has spared nothing for the rising generations.

articles.title: History: Ancient Hill-Fort in DPRK
articles.content:
History: Ancient Hill-Fort in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- In Hakhyon-dong, Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK there is a hill-fort called Suyangsansong, which dates back to the Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					 The fort gives a glimpse of the Korean nation's ardent patriotism and architecture.
					
					 From ancient times, it had been called Jisongsansong, one of the three forts in Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The fort is 5,258 meters in circumference, high in eastern, southern and northern parts and low in western part. There are two deep valleys and an open space inside it.
					
					 The fort is 6 to 7 meters in height, 7 to 8 meters in bed width, 3 to 4 meters in upper width and 14 meters in maximum thickness.
					
					 It, restored in 1676, has four gates in all directions. In the fort there are 14 bastions and general's terrace and building sites.
					
					 With this fort, the Korean people repelled the invasion of foreign aggressors in 1361 and during the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598).
					
					 Today the Suyangsansong has turned into a recreation ground for the working people under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday in an article praises leader Kim Jong Il for firmly defending Juche-oriented socialism and demonstrating the  dignity and invincibility of Songun Korea before the world with his extraordinary political caliber. 
					 The article notes: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, having the firm creed that Juche-oriented socialism is the life and soul of the Korean people, recorded an epic of patriotic loyalty to add glory to Korean-style socialism to which President Kim Il Sung devoted his whole life.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's energetic leadership, the President is remembered by the people as the eternal sun of Juche and his revolutionary history is given steady continuity generation after generation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il had made ceaseless journeys of Songun with his iron will and superhuman energy since the day he started the Songun revolutionary leadership till the last moments of his life, dedicating himself to defending socialist Korea.
					
					 It is ascribable to his Songun politics that the country has embarked upon the road of building a knowledge-based economic power and has a solid foundation for surpassing the world level in all fields.
					
					 The history of his revolutionary leadership is shining as a sacred road along which he remarkably consolidated the unity and cohesion of the revolutionary ranks by firmly adhering to the theory of rallying around the leader.
					
					 No force on earth can break the unity of the Songun revolutionary ranks achieved by him all his life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Formation of Pomminryon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Formation of Pomminryon
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The formation of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), a nationwide organization for the national reunification movement, was an event to be specially recorded in the national history as it marked a new phase in the development of the movement, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 November 20 Juche 79 (1990) saw the formation of Pomminryon consisting of Koreans from all walks of life in the north, the south and abroad and representing the will of all Koreans to reunify the country.
					
					 The 20 odd year-long history of Pomminryon is characterized by the patriotic cause in which all Koreans have positively pushed forward the movement for national reunification, united as one.
					
					 Pomminryon has waged indomitable struggles despite the vicious obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad. As a result, organizations under its umbrella were formed in every part of the world where Koreans live and their well-organized system was established. Pomminryon has grown to be a mass organization grouping compatriots from all walks of life.
					
					 It has left its remarkable traces in the efforts to arouse all Koreans to the drive for the great national unity and national reunification under the unfurled banner of the three charters for national reunification and the five-point policy for the great national unity.
					
					 It has made positive efforts to fulfill its mission and duty as a nationwide organization for the reunification movement under the uplifted banner of By Our Nation Itself after the adoption of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 It is faced with a weighty yet honorable task to encourage all Koreans at home and abroad to turn out in the struggle to frustrate the anti-reunification forces' moves to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, defend and implement the north-south declarations and give continuity to the June 15 era.
					
					 The patriotic cause of Pomminryon is sure to triumph as supreme leader Kim Jong Un clearly indicates the way to be followed by the Korean nation and steers the cause of national reunification through his outstanding and experienced leadership.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations are now inching close to the phase of serious catastrophe mainly because of the leaflet scattering operations of the south Korean authorities aimed to malignantly slander the DPRK. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an article. 
					 The anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations are a product of the invariable confrontational policy of the south Korean puppet authorities, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 There have been many regimes in south Korea. However, history knows no such regime as the present south Korean authorities who are busy conducting frantic anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations to hurl mud at their compatriots. 
					
					 It is the invariable policy goal of the south Korean authorities to realize the wild ambition to stifle the DPRK by ratcheting up sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK in collusion with outside forces and conducting such despicable psychological warfare as leaflet dropping. 
					
					 The leaflet dropping is a link of the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 Spy and intelligence services of south Korea are giving a petty amount of money to defectors from the north who fled to the south after committing crimes or abandoning their families, and hurling them into a false propaganda against the DPRK. They are taking them even to the international arena for a malignant smear campaign against the DPRK on the basis of fabrications. 
					
					 The anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations of such wicked traitors are part of the "human rights" racket against it. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly stand for north-south dialogue and the mending of the relations, they should drop their daggers hidden under their belts and stop all hostile acts including anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations.

articles.title: KCNA Slams US for Orchestrating Adoption of "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Slams US for Orchestrating Adoption of "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. human rights racket against the DPRK is inching close to an extreme phase which should not be overlooked any longer.
					 The "human rights resolution" against the DPRK was railroaded through the meeting of the Third Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly through high-handed practices and pressure at the instigation of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. orchestrated railroading of the "resolution" is lashing the army and people of the DPRK into great  fury as it is the most vivid manifestation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed to bring down the man-centred socialist system which was chosen by the Korean people and which they  consider as dearer than their own lives.
					
					 The U.S., regarding the "human rights issue" and the nuclear issue as the two mainstays of its policy to stifle the DPRK, is perpetrating grave politically-motivated provocations to realize the "regime change" in the DPRK at any cost under the pretext of "human rights".
					
					 Lurking behind the scenario of the EU and Japan which sponsored the "resolution" is the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed to bring down its social system by force of arms.
					
					 The "resolution" (A/C.3/69/L.28.Rev.1) submitted by some countries of the EU and Japan has no relevance with the promotion of genuine human rights as it is a product of the political and military confrontation and plot against the DPRK. The "resolution" is only based on the fabricated "testimonies" of "defectors from the north", who committed crimes and fled the country abandoning even their beloved ones including their parents, brothers and sisters alike. As such, it is no more than a compilation full of groundless political accusations and contradictions and has no qualification and credibility to be recognized as an official document of the United Nations.
					
					 The U.S. started the "human rights" offensive against the DPRK at the UN in real earnest which is aimed to create the impression that the DPRK is "a tundra of human rights" and thus invent an excuse of armed intervention.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the U.S. let its followers label the DPRK "human rights abuser" in the "resolution".
					
					 A dangerous precedent is being made to politicize and internationalize the human rights of individual countries and use it for bringing down their social systems.
					
					 The international community still vividly remembers the Yugoslav war ignited by the U.S. in 1999 under the pretext of "protection of human rights and minority." 
					
					 Experiencing the grave situation where even a crime of the strong is regarded as a good deed and a good deed of the weak is censured as an evil one, the Korean people have keenly realized once again the truth that human rights precisely means national sovereignty and it is guaranteed by powerful deterrence.
					
					 It is the Northeast Asian region with the Korean Peninsula as a center where the interests of the big powers are intertwined and clash.
					
					 Had the DPRK been weak in its sovereignty and failed to protect it, it would have already experienced not just the "color revolution" or what happened in the Mideast but its people would not have escaped horrible misfortune and disaster.
					
					 The U.S. hostile action makes it hard for the DPRK to exercise any restraint any longer in conducting a new nuclear test.
					
					 It is crystal clear that under the prevailing situation the DPRK's war deterrence will be bolstered up unlimitedly to cope with the U.S. armed intervention.
					
					 The U.S., the principal architect of the farce for adopting the recent "resolution", and its servants will be held wholly responsible for all the consequences to be entailed by it.
					
					 If the U.S. policy-makers have their senses, they had better make a cool judgment of the reality and a political decision conforming with the trend of the situation.

articles.title: KCNA Flays S. Korea for Mocking at International Community
articles.content:
KCNA Flays S. Korea for Mocking at International Community
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are talking about "peace and cooperation in Northeast Asia" in the international arena, while staging the largest-ever 2014 Hoguk drills.
					 This is an unpardonable mockery at all fellow countrymen and the international community aspiring after peace and stability.
					
					 The 2014 Hoguk drills which the puppet authorities bill as "rehearsals for just defense" are posing a grave threat to peace and security in Northeast Asia as they are a preliminary war and a test nuclear war against the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 This is fully evidenced by the daily expanding programs of the drills.
					
					 The 11th mechanized infantry division of the puppet army on Nov. 12 staged a drill for swiftly crossing a river by destroying the defense position of the DPRK, supported by artillery pieces and air force.
					
					 The puppet navy and marine corps staged a joint landing drill with U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the area of Phohang similar to the terrain of the DPRK on Nov. 15. As part of the drills expected to last till Thursday the warmongers conducted large-scale naval mobile drill for coping with the coastal defense of the DPRK and a firepower support exercise aimed to wipe out defense force, a landing drill, etc.
					
					 The U.S. navy specializing in clearing mines is involved in the joint landing drill. This goes to clearly prove that the drill is not the defensive one but an offensive exercise and war maneuver for invading the DPRK.
					
					 All war exercises are being staged in south Korea every year pursuant to the U.S. strategy for stifling the DPRK and dominating Asia.
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, the biggest hotspot in Asia, it will spill over to a world thermonuclear war.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are compelled to get involved in such nuclear war as a shock brigade of the U.S., their master, whether they like it or not, as they are dependent on it in the political, economic and military aspects.
					
					 Shortly ago, the south Korean authorities, taken in by crafty gimmicks of the U.S., abandoned their military sovereignty in fact and agreed with the U.S. to purchase cutting-edge war hardware including Global Hawk.
					
					 As seen above, it is none other than the U.S. and the puppet forces, its henchmen, who are threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Such being the hard fact, the south Korean authorities, the trouble makers, dare trumpet about "peace and security in Northeast Asia" and even the "north's abandonment of nukes". This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 They are working hard to mislead public opinion at any cost to conceal their confrontational nature and, at the same time, ignite a war for aggression against the DPRK by pushing the situation to an extreme pitch together with the U.S.
					
					 They are, indeed, top-class confrontational maniacs and warmongers who deserve curse and denunciation.
					
					 No matter what desperate moves they resort to, this will get them nowhere.
					
					 They would be well advised to stop daring mock at all Koreans and the world community and halt at once their reckless war moves.

articles.title: Building of Naval Base Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Building of Naval Base Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Society of Kangjong Villagers, the All-Islanders Measure Committee for Checking Jeju Military Base and the Measure Committee for Checking the Building of Jeju Naval Base of south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet National Assembly building on Nov. 18 where they denounced the authorities' building of a naval base.
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the "government" of mulling squandering a colossal amount of fund for building the Jeju naval base next year, reneging on its promise to the people.
					
					 They called for canceling all appropriations for the naval base in the draft budget for 2015.
					
					 Recent survey made by the Society and experts of international environment organizations proved that the projects of the military base, a huge breakwater, etc. have seriously damaged ecological environment in the area around the village, they held.
					
					 The construction of the naval base will escalate arms race and military confrontation in Northeast Asia, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Driving North-South Relations into Worst Phase
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Driving North-South Relations into Worst Phase
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Mun Hui Sang, chairman of the Emergency Measure Committee of the Democratic Alliance for New Politics, an opposition party of south Korea, on Nov. 18 accused the puppet chief executive of bedeviling the north-south relations, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The south-north relations have been on the lowest ebb for two years since the present chief executive took office, he deplored.
					
					 The chief executive is talking a lot about "confidence-building process" but she is not dealing with the north, the party concerned with the south-north relations, he charged.
					
					 She talked volumes about economic democratization, wellbeing and the like but the people's life is getting hard as the days go by, he said, adding steps for reducing the taxes of the plutocrats should be lifted, to begin with.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Slammed for Her Unreasonable Personnel Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Slammed for Her Unreasonable Personnel Policy
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Nov. 19 accused the puppet chief executive of her unreasonable personnel policy.
					 The chief executive let military generals hold the posts of the minister and vice-ministers of People's Security, a new organ of the "government", the editorial said, adding this reminds one of the personnel policy of Park Chung-Hee who put forward those from the army academy during his iron rule.
					
					 The army is called a pronoun of chronic irregularities and corruption and incompetence, it charged.
					
					 The army cyber command was detected for having been engaged in website red-herring for Park Geun Hye during the past "presidential election", it noted, saying she is getting about under the shadow of "yusin".

articles.title: Protest against Regime's Move to Forcibly Dissolve Opposition Party Mounts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Regime's Move to Forcibly Dissolve Opposition Party Mounts in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The movement for a declaration on the prevailing situation is gaining in scope and strength in south Korea in protest against the regime's move to forcibly dissolve the Unified Progressive Party.
					 Members of civic and public bodies grouping people of all social strata in South Jolla Province, including the South Jolla Provincial Solidarity for Progress, the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations of South Jolla Province, the Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Association of the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Kwangju Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions, held a press conference outside the building of the provincial office on Nov. 17.
					
					 They underlined the need to fight the present regime hell-bent on forcibly dissolving the opposition party.
					
					 Proposing a movement for a declaration on the prevailing situation involving 10,000 people in protest against the regime's move, they called upon the people from all walks of life in the province to turn out in actions.
					
					 Civic and public organizations and members of the opposition party in the area of Kwangju also held a press conference on Nov. 18 and published a declaration on the prevailing situation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in pamphlet by the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble career of loving the country and people.
					
					 It also indicates the important matters arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place on Nov. 13.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Nigerian Figure
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of releasing supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was held at the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria on Nov. 13.
					 At the ceremony the president of the publishing house said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot who performed the undying feats to be recorded forever in history of the DPRK by loving the country and people more ardently than anyone and devoting his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 The beloved country and people were always cherished deep in his mind.
					
					 Epoch-making changes registered in the DPRK and its proud reality are a precious fruition brought about by his noble patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un published the above-said work in order to make the Korean people put Kim Jong Il's patriotism into practice of building a thriving nation by following his noble example.

articles.title: Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Korean People: Guinean Figure
articles.content:
Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Korean People: Guinean Figure
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people who are defending the dignity and peace of the country and stepping up the building of a thriving socialist  nation under the leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said this in a statement on Nov. 13 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, applied it to the revolution and construction and thus turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power which nobody dares provoke.
					
					 He smashed the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK with his original Songun politics and firmly defended Korean socialism and peace and security of the world.
					
					 He channeled his big efforts into the development of the relations with the countries aspiring after independence and greatly encouraged the cause of global independence through his energetic external activities in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 Seeing the reality of Korea, we are more deeply realizing the ideological and theoretical profundity of the Juche idea and its vitality and advantages.
					
					 His revolutionary idea and immortal exploits will shine forever.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressives along with prosperous socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Politics Lauded by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Politics Lauded by German Organization
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "Character of Kim Jong Un's politics" on Nov. 12, illustrated with his photo inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					 The article said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un has led socialist Korea to victory undeterred by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' challenges and all trials of history.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Firstly, his politics is pure in terms of philosophical thought.
					
					 This is clearly proved by the contents of his first open speech that caught global attention in April, 2012.
					
					 Secondly, his politics is characterized by firm determination and transparent faith.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula was serious due to the U.S. and its followers' violent challenges in December 2012 but Kim Jong Un let the DPRK successfully launch satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 as it planned and thus showed the world once again that Korea does whatever it is determined to do.
					
					 The DPRK's economic situation is still not good but it is his firm determination to build as soon as possible a thriving socialist nation and highly-civilized nation in which all dreams and ideals of the people come true.
					
					 Thirdly, his politics is a mysterious one which nobody can predict.
					
					 He has driven the U.S. into a tight corner with his stratagem whose depth and width no one can imagine in the long-standing confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The world came to know about the caliber of the DPRK leader who is handling matters concerning the U.S. at his will, bolstering the political system and pushing forward the military and economic construction.

articles.title: British Party Denounces US Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
British Party Denounces US Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- The November-December issue of the organ of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) carried an article denouncing the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					 The article said that the U.S. is getting ever-more undisguised in its attempt to put politically-motivated pressure on the independent countries by abusing the noble issue of human rights in the international arena and interfere in their internal affairs.
					
					 Its typical example is the vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" racket by the imperialists, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 The hostile forces are persistently raising the issue of "human rights" to tarnish the image of the DPRK and pull down the socialist system chosen by the Korean people.
					
					 The report made public by the DPRK Society for Human Rights Studies under such situation fully reflected the human rights system and situation in the DPRK, proving that the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. and its followers is groundless.
					
					 They had better look back on their serious human rights situation before taking issue with "human rights" issue in the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is concentrating efforts on the building of an economic power while resolutely smashing the hostile forces' "human rights" racket against it and meeting all challenges. It is also making positive efforts to provide the people with affluent living conditions.
					
					 Sinister intention and political attempt to hurt human rights in the DPRK is bound to go bust.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae y su comitiva visitan varios lugares de Moscu
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae y su comitiva visitan varios lugares de Moscu
Moscu, 19 de noviembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quien realiza una visita a la Federacion Rusa en calidad de enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y su comitiva visitaron el dia 18 el Museo Central de la Gran Guerra Patria en Moscu.
					Los visitantes recorrieron varios puntos del museo, inclusive los salones con escenas panoramicas alusivas a las principales batallas, entabladas durante la guerra URSS-Alemania, escuchando explicaciones sobre los meritos heroicos del Ejercito Rojo y el pueblo ruso que desempenaron papel decisivo en rechazar la agresion de la Alemania fascista y destruir el fascismo.
					
					Choe firmo un libro de visitas.
					
					El dia 19, Choe y sus acompanantes hicieron recorrido por el Mausoleo de Lenin, la tumba de heroes desconocidos, Kremlin, etc.

articles.title: No Kwang Chol se reune con su homologo ruso
articles.content:
No Kwang Chol se reune con su homologo ruso
Moscu, 19 de noviembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El subjefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, No Kwang Chol, quien se encuentra ahora en Moscu como integrante de la comitiva del enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se reunio el dia 19 con Andrei Kartapolov, subjefe del Estado Mayor General de las Fuerzas Armadas Federales de Rusia y director general de su buro de operaciones.
					Ambas partes intercambiaron ampliamente las opiniones para desarrollar en una nueva etapa mas alta la amistad y la cooperacion entre los ejercitos de dos paises.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el agregado militar de la embajada coreana en Rusia, el subdirector general del buro de operaciones del Estado Mayor General de las Fuerzas Armadas Federales de Rusia.
					
					Por otra parte, el viceministro coreano de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Kwang Gun, otro acompanante del enviado especial, se reunio el mismo dia con el ministro de Desarrollo del Lejano Oriente de Rusia, Alexandr Galushka.
					
					En ese encuentro se debatieron las medidas para desarrollar mas la cooperacion entre ambos paises en las esferas economica y comercial y lograr mas exitos sustanciales.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 20 una declaracion condenando la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC aprobada en la ONU.
					El pasado dia 18, en el tercer comite del 69o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, Estados Unidos cometio la grave provocacion politica de aprobar por la fuerza la "resolucion de derechos humanos" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea instigando a la Union Europea y Japon y recogiendo los votos a favor mediante la coercion y la presion politico-economica, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					La "resolucion" se basa en el "reporte de la comision de investigacion" sobre la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC, el cual recoge los fabricados "testimonios" de algunos "fugitivos norcoreanos" que huyeron de nuestro pais despues de cometer delitos o resultaron raptados. 
					
					En la historia de la ONU nunca hubo el antecedente de fabricar con premura el "reporte de investigacion" sin dialogar con el pais interesado ni visitarlo ni una sola vez y adoptar luego a base del mismo la "resolucion" de la Asamblea General.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. pudo recoger a duras penas los votos necesarios a la aprobacion, no pocos paises confesaron que votaron a favor no por el problema de DDHH sino por la amenaza de EE.UU. y Japon con suspender la ayuda economica. Este hecho deja conocer que la aprobacion de la presente "resolucion" fue un fraude politico. 
					
					Al ofrecerse como patrocinadores de la aprobacion de la "resolucion" anti-RPDC, algunos paises de la UE y Japon revelaron por si mismos que sus "esfuerzos por los DDHH" distan mucho de la promocion y mejoramiento genuino de DDHH y fueron un acto de sumision a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Esta vez, hemos manifestado la voluntad de cooperar ampliamente en la rama de DDHH y promover el dialogo y el intercambio en el mismo dominio, pero las fuerzas hostiles negaron por fin la cooperacion y optaron por el enfrentamiento. 
					
					De esta manera, los paises satelites de EE.UU. mostraron que fue una hipocresia su demanda sobre el dialogo de DDHH y cerraron por si mismos las puertas de dialogos, inclusive el de DDHH, y de intercambio y cooperacion. 
					
					El inicio de la ofensiva de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. persigue el objetivo hostil de tildarla de "zona de violacion de DDHH" en los escenarios de la ONU y buscar el pretexto de intervencion armada. 
					
					La historia recuerda fresco todavia la guerra de Yugoslavia desatada por EE.UU. en 1999 bajo el pretexto de "defensa de DDHH y minorias".
					
					Se va haciendo el peligroso antecedente de politizar e internacionalizar el problema de DDHH de un pais y abusarlo en el derrocamiento de su regimen. 
					
					La realidad de hoy, en que la ley internacional es cohibida por el despotismo, comprueba la doctrina de la RPDC, segun la cual los derechos humanos son precisamente la soberania estatal. 
					
					Rechazamos categoricamente la presente "resolucion", aprobada de manera forzada bajo el papel protagonico de EE.UU. a fin de derrocar el regimen socialista humano-centrico optado y considerado mas valioso que la vida por el pueblo coreano, considerandola como maxima expresion de la politica hostil anticoreana. 
					
					Puesto que los actos hostiles anti-RPDC de EE.UU. nos obligan a no abstener de la nueva prueba nuclear, se consolidara ilimitadamente el disuasivo de guerra de la RPDC para hacer frente a la intervencion e invasion armada de EE.UU. 
					
					La responsabilidad por todas las consecuencias que emanen de la aprobacion de la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC recaera sobre los autores principales y ejecutores de la adopcion.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia maniobras belicas de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia maniobras belicas de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 20 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la actualidad, las autoridades surcoreanas libran los ejercicios Hoguk 2014 sin precedentes en la historia, mientras abogan tanto por la "paz y cooperacion del Nordeste Asiatico" en la escena internacional.
					 Esto deviene una burla imperdonable a todos los coreanos y la sociedad internacional aspirantes a la paz y la estabilidad.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas los califican de "ejercicios justos para defensa", pero el presente simulacro constituye de rabo a cabo la guerra preliminar, guerra de ensayo nuclear contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lo que amenaza severamente hasta la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste de Asia.
					
					  Lo comprueba el estado de ejecucion de dicho entrenamiento que se amplia cada dia mas.
					
					  El dia 12, la 11a division de infanteria motorizada del ejercito surcoreano libro el entrenamiento de derribar la posicion defensiva de la RPDC y cruzar rapidamente el rio bajo el apoyo del fuego de artilleria y las fuerzas aereas.
					
					  Las fuerzas maritimas y la infanteria de marina del ejercito titere desarrollaron a partir del dia 15 el entrenamiento combinado de desembarco junto con las tropas yanquis en los alrededores de Phohang semejante a la RPDC en las condiciones topograficas.
					
					  En este simulacro planeado hasta hoy los belicistas libraron en gran escala el entrenamiento movil maritimo frente a la defensa costera de la RPDC, el de apoyo de fuego encaminado a "aniquilar" las fuerzas armadas de defensa, el de desembarco, etc.
					
					  Especialmente, las fuerzas maritimas norteamericanas encargadas de desminar, participaron en el entrenamiento combinado de desembarco, lo que prueba que el presente simulacro no es para defensa sino para el ataque y la agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					  Segun la estrategia de aplastamiento a la RPDC y dominacion de Asia de EE.UU., se desarrollan cada ano los ejercicios belicos de caracter agresivo de varios tipos.
					
					  Si estalla la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, region mas candente de Asia, esto se extendera a la guerra termonuclear en escala mundial.
					
					  Los titeres sometidos en lo politico, economico y militar a EE.UU., no pueden menos que participar en la guerra nuclear como brigada de choque de su amo gringo.
					
					  Hace poco, las autoridades surcoreanas, embaucadas por el maquiavelismo taimado de EE.UU., abandonaron de hecho su soberania militar y acordaron con su amo gringo comprar los pertrechos belicos de punta tales como aviones sin piloto "Global Hawk" con radio de operacion de miles de kilometros.
					
					  Asi los amenazadores principales de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico son EE.UU. y sus lacayos surcoreanos.
					
					  Tales tipejos se atreven a hablar cinicamente de la "paz y cooperacion del Nordeste Asiatico" y la "renuncia nuclear del Norte".
					
					  Su objetivo reside en encubrir de un modo u otro su naturaleza conflictiva desviando la opinion publica, agravar al maximo la situacion con su amo norteamericano detras de la cortina y desatar a toda costa la guerra de agresion.
					
					  Los titeres surcoreanos son maniacos conflictivos e histericos de guerra que merecen recibir maldicion y condenacion.
					
					  Por mucho que actue con frenesi la banda titere, esto significa arar en el mar.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben atreverse a burlarse de todos los coreanos y la sociedad internacional y cesar de inmediato las absurdas maniobras belicas.
